text_block_list.text:
『Don't ever look away』―― 
Almost as if commanded, I couldn't tear my gaze away from her.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Haa……haa……haa――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaaa!!!!

It had been a few months since I had arrived at Tracen Academy. 
I was hoping to scout an Uma Musume so I had come to observe training.

I was also checking on the participants in the upcoming 
mock race. But the most notable of these was Verxina――

From her calm outward appearance, it was a fierce run you wouldn't 
expect. I just couldn't take my eyes off her regal presence.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――Do you have some business with me?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Oh my……――Fufuu, thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad my amateurish running wasn't unsightly. 
Well then, I have a prior engagement so I'll excuse myself here.

I couldn't bring myself to stop her as she walked away. 
For a while, I was unable to move from that spot.
choice_data_list: (Her run……was burned in to my memory……)

text_block_list.text:
She was dignified and resolute. Like she was aiming higher, 
and higher, continuing to improve herself――

I wanted to be there to see where that run would take her. 
In that moment, I knew what my dream was.

The next day. 
I was looking for Verxina to try and form a contract with her――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――♪ And surpass, this boundless world――

text_block_list.name: Musical Instructor
text_block_list.text:
……As expected of Verxina-san. 
Even while training, you still managed to come this far.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much. However, I still haven't reached 
my goal…… I intend to continue studying further, so 
I'm thankful for your continued guidance.

It seems like Verxina was also taking voice lessons. Seeing her 
working so diligently, many Uma Musume were looking on in admiration.

text_block_list.name: Spectating Horsegirls
text_block_list.text:
『Looks like she's going to throw now!』 
『Hey, I can't see anything!』 『Shhh! Don't bother her』
(BANG!!)

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……Fuuu. ……Not good enough. Since I haven't been throwing 
regularly, it really does feel like I've gotten rusty.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: …………Alright
(BANG!!)

Since she was outside today, I wanted to try talking 
to her but, I really didn't want to disturb her.

After that, I continued searching for 
Verxina several times hoping to scout her, but――
choice_data_list: (There's no chance to talk to her……!)

text_block_list.text:
It seems like she has a very stoic personality. 
Every time I saw her, she was always diligently working on something.

I found myself drawn more and more to her earnest nature, 
but I still couldn't bring myself to talk to her. Before 
I realized it, the mock race was just around the corner.
choice_data_list: (I wanted to be the first to talk to her)

text_block_list.name: Verxina's Fan
text_block_list.text: Hey! It looks like Verxina-senpai is back!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ――Mmmm～～that was fun, huh～? Onee-chan's Getting Scouted Pre-party♪

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Mama's just being too hasty. 
Even though I've only just been talked to by a bunch of people.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
That just means it's all up to Onee-chan's feelings. 
Onee-chan really is amazing～! Right, Chevacchi!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
……that's right. 
It just means that everyone see's Nee-san in the same――

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: ――Huh, u-uwaaaaaaah……!?

text_block_list.name: Verxina's Fans
text_block_list.text:
『Verxina-senpai! Do your best in tomorrow's mock race!』 
『Verxina-sama! Tomorrow, we'll definitely come cheer for you!』

It seems like they were all waiting for a chance 
to talk to her too. As soon as they got out of 
the car, they were surrounded by a group of fans.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――Everyone

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
I'm truly grateful for your enthusiastic support. 
However――don't you think you're exaggerating a bit?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
The mock race is just a way to confirm your current state. 
It's just a chance to show if you can reach for the 『Peak』.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Of course, tomorrow, I'll show you what victory is like 
for someone aiming for that 『Peak』. Without a doubt.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
That's why you should feel free to come and see. 
――Well then, please excuse me.

The 『Peak』――I now knew that was her aspiration. 
All her efforts everyday were for this. And so, the next day――

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Goaaaaaal!!!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
With a lead of over 1 length with the Uma Musume behind her, 
Verxina claims victory in this mock race!!

Just as she declared, she had won the race. 
And then she was surrounded by people trying to scout her.

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text:
『Verxina-san! Have you thought about my scouting offer?』 
『I've personalized a training plan for you, will you take a look?』

This time, I couldn't afford to miss out. 
I was about to speak out too――but then――

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
B-big news! 
It sounds like that girl is aiming for her Debut too!

With that announcement, there was a moment 
of utter chaos among those gathered.....
